Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What priorities her Department has in Bangladesh for the next 12 months.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What steps she is taking to improve the co-ordination of humanitarian support for Syria and the surrounding region.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What support her Department provides for the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria; and if she will make a statement.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What plans she has to support the application of agricultural science, research and innovation in developing economies.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What steps her Department takes to reduce the impact of natural disasters by increasing the resilience of communities.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What assessment she has made of likely population growth in North and West Africa by 2050; and if she will make a statement.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What steps her Department is taking to end aid dependency through jobs and economic development.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the upholding of humanitarian commitments made by the government of Democratic Republic of Congo and other countries in that region under the Peace, Security and Co-operation Framework to date.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the effectiveness of UK-Israeli co-operation on international development.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What assessment she has made of the likely effects of the outcomes agreed at the G8 Summit in June 2013 on developing countries.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the effect on poverty of the role of UK money-transfer firms in facilitating remittance payments to developing countries.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the humanitarian situation in Syria and neighbouring countries.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What steps her Department is taking to eradicate child labour.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What steps she is taking to improve the co-ordination of humanitarian support for Syria and the surrounding region.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: What recent assessment she has made of the role of Fairtrade goods in development.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for International Development
Question.Text: If she will make a statement on her departmental responsibilities.

Question.Department: Prime Minister
Question.Text: How many foreign national prisoners (a) are in prison and (b) were in prison in May 2010; and what steps are being taken to send them to secure detention in their own countries and to negotiate compulsory prisoner transfer agreements with high-volume countries.
